_comment: Optimized config for qwen2.5vl:7b-32k (32K context) - With 32K context, can now enable ALL processors!
_comment_model: Custom 32K context model - perfect for vision tasks!
_comment_table: Tables are hard - this provides the best ROI
_comment_form: Form field detection - useful for medical documents
_comment_image: Optional - Alt-text generation for images (enable if needed)
_comment_page: Optional - Overall page accuracy (enable for complex layouts)
_comment_complex: Optional - Nested layout handling (enable if needed)
_comment_handwriting: Optional - Handwriting OCR (enable if documents have annotations)
_comment_ocr: Recommended for best quality with complex layouts
